title: How to Make a Quick Egg Snack

steps.headline: Take the contents of an egg.
Add some salt and red chili powder to it.
Leave it aside and take some onion, tomato, chili, coriander, and carrot(optional) pieces.
Grind these vegetables.
steps.description: Make it into paste, and add a pinch of salt to the mixture.

steps.headline: Take a cooking pan, spread some oil on it and pour the egg mixture.
Flip the omelet and apply the mixture of vegetables on it.
Roll the omelet and again apply a little bit of oil to it.
Cut the roll into pieces, add some coriander for garnishing, and serve hot.

text: Take the contents of an egg.  Add some salt and red chili powder to it. and mix it properly. Leave it aside and take some onion, tomato, chili, coriander, and carrot(optional) pieces.  Grind these vegetables. Make it into paste, and add a pinch of salt to the mixture. Take a cooking pan, spread some oil on it and pour the egg mixture. (to make an omelet). Flip the omelet and apply the mixture of vegetables on it.  Roll the omelet and again apply a little bit of oil to it.  Cut the roll into pieces, add some coriander for garnishing, and serve hot.
